titleInfo.title: The Relationship between Eugenics and the so-called Euthanasia Action in Nazi Germany: A Eugenically Motivated Peace Policy and the Killing of Mentally Handicapped during the Second World War

bibliographicCitation.apa: Kühl, S. (2001). The Relationship between Eugenics and the so-called Euthanasia Action in Nazi Germany: A Eugenically Motivated Peace Policy and the Killing of Mentally Handicapped during the Second World War. In M. Szöllösi-Janze (Ed.), German historical perspectives series: Vol. 12. Science in the Third Reich (pp. 185-210). Oxford: Berg.
